name: Name
no-artist: No artists are associated with this recording.
about-p-1: is a web application for the musical mediation of choral works. It offers recordings of various pieces where users have the option of emphasizing selected individual voices.
about-p-2: The name is a reference to the playing instruction "divisi" in music, which – in contrast to "unisono" – means that the musicians are playing in separate parts. At the same time, reference is made here to one of the most commonly used elements in web development: the <div>, which can be used to group and divide markup elements.
about-p-3: was created as part of the seminar "Introduction to Digital Musicology" with Prof. Dr. Stefan Morent in the summer semester 2024 at the Institute of Musicology at the University of Tübingen.
